name: Default option pseudo-class
description:
This pseudo-class is called the **default option** and it selects the default element among a set of the same elements. It would select the default item of a select list or a button which is its form default button for example.
[info]This pseudo-class is also part of the CSS3UI specification.[/info]
example_description: The mentioned example would set the `background-color` of a default element of a selection list/button group to `gray`.
